Name: Juniper
SeedDescription: Plant these in winter. Takes 13 days to mature, and keeps producing after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en invierno. Toma 13 días para madurar, continua produciendo después de la primera cosecha.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 겨울 작물. 성장하면 13일이 소요되며, 수확한 후에도 계속 생산됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen sie im Winter. Wächst in 13 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no inverno. Demora 13 dias para amadurecer e continua produzindo após a primeira colheita.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 冬天种植。13天成熟，收获之后还能继续结果。
